Ingredients.4: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.5: 1 tablespoon olive oil, or more as needed

Directions.1: Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and add enough water to reach the bottom of the steamer. Bring water to a boil. Add potatoes, cover, and steam until fork tender, about 10 minutes.

Directions.2: Transfer potatoes to a bowl. Add parsley, garlic powder, salt, and pepper; toss to coat.

Directions.3: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add potatoes to hot oil and cook, shaking the skillet occasionally, until potatoes are browned on all sides, about 10 minutes.
